author: lukaszlenart
msg: WW-3177 adds better way to handle error messages when an exception occurs, adds support for I18N to translate exceptions and adds default error messages

author: sebb
msg: Fix typo introduced when version was converted to property

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3773: Hash based on the external String id rather than the indexed representation for distributed updates.

author: davsclaus
msg: AMQ-4008: Fixed issue with re-deploying AMQ broker in same JVM such as Apache Tomcat, with the jmx connector not working on re-deployment. Now it does. Improved logging and better message to end user about the JMX issue.
